alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 29 at 6:03PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for northwestern Roger Mills and southwestern Ellis Counties. * AT 557 PM CDT, a dangerous wildfire was located 5 to 7 miles north of Durham, moving rapidly northeast at 3 to 5 mph. A second fire continues to threaten areas near Crawford. * Areas impacted... Durham, the Antelope Hills area north of Durham near the Canadian River, and areas near Crawford. * Additional Information...The fire is accelerating and exhibiting extreme fire behavior as it burns into the Canadian River valley. Dangerous fire behavior is likely occurring. $$ TL
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire.
